TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VirtualPathUtility extends System.Object
public ref class VirtualPathUtility abstract sealed

summary.span: Provides utility methods for common virtual path operations.

span.span: Provides utility methods for common virtual path operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了对常见操作涉及虚拟路径的实用工具方法。The class provides utility methods for common operations involving virtual paths. 有关 ASP.NET 服务器控件和服务器代码，使用 Web 应用程序根目录运算符的虚拟路径波形符 （~），通常用于而不是相对和绝对路径。For ASP.NET server controls and server code, virtual paths using the Web application root operator, the tilde (~), commonly are used instead of relative and absolute paths. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 项目路径](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2447f50c-b849-483c-8093-85ed53e7a5bd)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Project Paths](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2447f50c-b849-483c-8093-85ed53e7a5bd). 使用类时需要将相对于应用程序路径转换为绝对虚拟路径，如可能是这种情况在开发自定义 Web 服务处理程序。Use the class when you need to convert application-relative paths to absolute virtual paths, as might be the case in developing a custom Web service handler. 绝对的虚拟路径以斜杠 （/） 开头。An absolute virtual path starts with the literal slash mark (/). 相对虚拟路径是相对于应用程序根目录中，如果只是波形符 （~） 或开头颚化符和使用双反斜杠 (~\\\\) 或颚化符和斜杠标记 (~ /)。A relative virtual path is relative to the application root directory, if it is just a tilde (~) or starts with the tilde and a double backslash (~\\\\) or the tilde and a slash mark (~/). 使虚拟路径相对使得独立于应用程序路径。Making a virtual path relative makes the path independent of the application. 可以从获取应用程序的虚拟目录和属性。The virtual directory for the application can be obtained from the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 类不用于安全或规范化目的。The class is not intended for security or canonicalization purposes. 有关 Web 应用程序安全性的详细信息，请参阅[Web 应用程序安全威胁概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88d61678-f84e-4622-ae80-53128821855a)。For more information about Web application security, see [Overview of Web Application Security Threats](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/88d61678-f84e-4622-ae80-53128821855a). 有关一般 URL 处理功能，请参阅。For generic URL processing functionality, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类和一些方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class and some of its methods. 首先，属性生成网页上的虚拟路径。First, the property generates the virtual path to the Web page. ， ，和方法返回的虚拟路径相关信息。The , , and methods return information about the virtual path. 接下来，属性生成当前请求，这可能是从不同的虚拟路径属性，如果调用了方法。Next, the property generates a virtual path of the current request, which might be different from the property, if a method was called. ， ，和方法返回的虚拟路径相关信息。The , , and methods return information about the virtual path. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/cs/virtualpathutilitycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/vb/virtualpathutilityvb.aspx#1)]

The modified virtual path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果文本斜杠标记 （/） 存在的虚拟路径的末尾，则不会修改的虚拟路径。If the literal slash mark (/) exists at the end of the virtual path, the virtual path is not modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回的值如果相对路径是完全波形符 （~） 的属性。The method returns the value of the property if the relative path is exactly a tilde (~). 方法使用属性值而不是基路径中，如果以波形符和斜杠标记开头的相对路径 (~ /); 否则为方法使用的基路径。The method uses the property value rather than the base path, if the relative path starts with a tilde and a slash mark (~/); otherwise, the method uses the base path.

span.span: is a physical path.
-or- includes one or more colons.
is or an empty string.
-or- is or an empty string.

span.span: The virtual path.

summary.span: Returns the directory portion of a virtual path.

span.span: Returns the directory portion of a virtual path.

returns.span: The directory referenced in the virtual path.

span.span: The directory referenced in the virtual path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`virtualPath`不根路径; 也就是说，它不等于根目录运算符 （波形符 [~]），不以开头波形符 （~），例如波形符和斜杠标记 (~ /) 或波形符和使用双反斜杠 (~ / /)，或不以斜杠标记 （/） 开头异常 则会引发。If `virtualPath` is not rooted; that is, it does not equal the root operator (the tilde [~]), does not start with a tilde (~), such as a tilde and a slash mark (~/) or a tilde and a double backslash (~//), or does not start with a slash mark (/), an exception is thrown. 如果传递到的虚拟路径方法是`"/images/image1.gif"`，则返回的目录是`"/images"`。If the virtual path that is passed into the method is `"/images/image1.gif"`, the returned directory is `"/images"`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用， ，和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. [!code-csharp[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/cs/virtualpathutilitycs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/vb/virtualpathutilityvb.aspx#2)]

span.span: is not rooted.

exception.span: \- or - is or an empty string.

span.span: \- or - is or an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果传递到的虚拟路径方法是`"/images/image1.gif"`，返回的扩展名是`".gif"`。If the virtual path that is passed into the method is `"/images/image1.gif"`, the returned extension is `".gif"`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用， ，和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks 虚拟路径可以是只需根目录运算符 （波形符 [~]），也可以开头根目录运算符。The virtual path can be just the root operator (the tilde [~]), or it can begin with the root operator. 如果`virtualPath`是`null`、引发异常。If `virtualPath` is `null`, an exception is raised. 如果`virtualPath`为空字符串 ("")，则方法返回`false`。If `virtualPath` is an empty string (""), the method returns `false`. > [!NOTE] > `"~` `filename` `"` 不是有效的虚拟路径，并返回`false`为方法。`"~` `filename` `"` is not a valid virtual path and returns `false` for the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用， ，和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. [!code-csharp[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/cs/virtualpathutilitycs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/vb/virtualpathutilityvb.aspx#3)]

span.span: The relative virtual path from to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`fromPath`和`toPath`参数不取得 root 权限; 也就是说，它们不相等根目录运算符 （波形符 [~]），不会启动与波形符 （~），例如波形符和斜杠标记 (~ /) 或波形符和使用双反斜杠 (~ / /)，或使用的斜杠标记 （不启动/），引发异常。If the `fromPath` and `toPath` parameters are not rooted; that is, they do not equal the root operator (the tilde [~]), do not start with a tilde (~), such as a tilde and a slash mark (~/) or a tilde and a double backslash (~//), or do not start with a slash mark (/), an exception is thrown. 确定的相对路径不使用查询字符串参数和 URI 中使用的 HTML 定位点。Query string parameters and HTML anchors that are used in the URI are not used in determining the relative path. 如果`fromPath`是`"/directory1/file1.aspx"`和`toPath`是`"/directory2/file2.aspx"`、方法返回`"../directory2/file2.aspx"`。If `fromPath` is `"/directory1/file1.aspx"` and `toPath` is `"/directory2/file2.aspx"`, the method returns `"../directory2/file2.aspx"`.

span.span: is not rooted.
\- or - is not rooted.

summary.span: Removes a trailing slash mark (/) from a virtual path.

span.span: Removes a trailing slash mark (/) from a virtual path.

returns.span: A virtual path without a trailing slash mark, if the virtual path is not already the root directory ("/"); otherwise, .

span.span: A virtual path without a trailing slash mark, if the virtual path is not already the root directory ("/"); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从虚拟路径的末尾移除斜杠标记 （/）。The method removes a slash mark (/) from the end of the virtual path. 如果已指定的虚拟路径的根目录 (`"/"`)，不执行任何操作。If the virtual path is already the root directory (`"/"`), no action is taken. 如果虚拟路径`null`或空字符串 ("")，则方法返回`null`。If the virtual path is `null` or an empty string (""), the method returns `null`.

summary.span: Converts a virtual path to an application absolute path.

span.span: Converts a virtual path to an application absolute path.

span.span: The absolute path representation of the specified virtual path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序绝对路径是应用程序路径使用而不是根目录运算符 （波形符 [~]） 的位置。An application absolute path is one where the application path is used instead of the root operator (the tilde [~]). 如果`virtualPath`是：If `virtualPath` is: - 绝对，方法返回未更改的虚拟路径。Absolute, the method returns the virtual path unchanged. - 相对于应用程序，方法将当前的应用程序虚拟目录路径追加到的开头`virtualPath`。Application relative, the method appends the current application virtual directory path to the beginning of the `virtualPath`. 例如，可以从访问当前的应用程序虚拟目录路径属性。For example, the current application virtual directory path can be accessed from the property. - 未取得 root 权限，方法引发异常。Not rooted, the method raises an exception.

span.span: is not rooted.

exception.span: A leading double period (..) is used to exit above the top directory.

span.span: A leading double period (..) is used to exit above the top directory.

span.span: The absolute virtual path representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重载方法使用提供的应用程序路径而不是当前的应用程序路径。The overload of the method uses the supplied application path rather than the current application path. 如果`virtualPath`是：If `virtualPath` is: - 绝对，方法返回未更改的虚拟路径。Absolute, the method returns the virtual path with no changes. - 相对于应用程序，方法将添加`applicationPath`到的虚拟路径的开头。Application relative, the method adds `applicationPath` to the beginning of the virtual path. - 未取得 root 权限，方法引发异常。Not rooted, the method raises an exception.

span.span: is not rooted.

exception.span: A leading double period (..) is used in the application path to exit above the top directory.

span.span: A leading double period (..) is used in the application path to exit above the top directory.

The application-relative path representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果应用程序的虚拟路径是`"myapp"`和虚拟路径`"/myApp/sub/default.asp"`传递到方法，生成的应用程序相对路径是`"~/sub/default.aspx"`。If the virtual path for the application is `"myapp"` and the virtual path `"/myApp/sub/default.asp"` is passed into the method, the resulting application-relative path is `"~/sub/default.aspx"`. 如果`virtualPath`才会使用当前的应用程序路径、方法返回未更改的虚拟路径。If `virtualPath` does not start with the current application path, the method returns the virtual path unchanged. 如果`virtualPath`是应用程序路径中，相同根目录运算符 （波形符 [~]），将返回。If `virtualPath` is the same as the application path, the root operator (the tilde [~]), is returned. 例如，可以从访问当前的应用程序虚拟目录路径属性。For example, the current application virtual directory path can be accessed from the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用， ，和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. [!code-csharp[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/cs/virtualpathutilitycs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.VirtualPathUtility#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.VirtualPathUtility/vb/virtualpathutilityvb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重载方法使用`applicationPath`而不是当前的应用程序路径。The overload of the method uses `applicationPath` rather than the current application path. 如果`virtualPath`开头不`applicationPath`、方法返回未更改的虚拟路径。If `virtualPath` does not start with `applicationPath`, the method returns the virtual path unchanged.
